Mission: To Deliver Empowering Businesses Solutions Via Web Development, Data Management, and Performance Analytics

What do I do?

I have been in the education sector for over eight years. I am now developing the first online learning module for non-native English speakers in business, legal, technical, educational, and medical professions and studies in the province of Foggia, Italy. With my fellow educators, our students, and other volunteers, we have collaborated an effort to enhance business, education, and non-profit practices with technology and data sciences.
